description: Defines API endpoints for 'trends' in a web application, specifically mapping routes under '/api/trends' and handling GET requests to retrieve latest trends related to AI in mechanical engineering.

classes.name: TrendsEndpoints
classes.description: Contains extension method to map all trends-related API endpoints.

methods.name: MapTrendsEndpoints
methods.description: Extension method that maps the '/api/trends' endpoints, including a GET request for latest AI trends.
